      • conjugate

        public Quaternion conjugate()
        Returns the conjugate of this quaternion. The conjugate negates the imaginary part of the quaternion.
        Returns:
        quaternion

      • toMatrix3x3

        public Matrix3x3 toMatrix3x3()
        Convert to a rotation matrix. This quaternion needs to be normalized for this method to result in a proper rotation matrix. This is not tested at runtime, as this would incur a performance penalty.
        Returns:
        3x3 rotation matrix

      • toMatrix3x3

        public static Matrix3x3 toMatrix3x3(double w,
                                    double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double z)
        Creates a matrix matrix for a normalized quaternion. Note that the given quaternion is expected to be normalized.
        Parameters:
        w - real part
        x - first element of the imaginary vector
        y - second element of the imaginary vector
        z - third element of the imaginary vector
        Returns:
        3x3 rotation matrix

      • toAffine3D

        public Affine3D toAffine3D()
        Creates an affine matrix from this quaternion. This quaternion needs to be normalized for this method to result in a proper rotation matrix. This is not tested at runtime, as this would incur a performance penalty.
        Returns:
        affine matrix

      • toAffine3D

        public static Affine3D toAffine3D(double w,
                                  double x,
                                  double y,
                                  double z)
        Creates a rotation affine matrix from a normalized quaternion. Note that the quaternion is expected to be normalized. The translation components of the affine may be directly specified, as it is very common to combine a rotation and translation into a affine transformation.
        Parameters:
        w - real part
        x - first entry of the imaginary vector
        y - second entry of the imaginary vector
        z - third entry of the imaginary vector
        Returns:
        affine matrix

      • toAffine3D

        public Affine3D toAffine3D(Vector3D translation)
        Creates an affine matrix from this quaternion. This quaternion needs to be normalized for this method to result in a proper rotation matrix. This is not tested at runtime, as this would incur a performance penalty.
        Parameters:
        translation - translation to use
        Returns:
        affine matrix

      • toAffine3D

        public Affine3D toAffine3D(double tx,
                           double ty,
                           double tz)
        Creates an affine matrix from this quaternion. This quaternion needs to be normalized for this method to result in a proper rotation matrix. This is not tested at runtime, as this would incur a performance penalty.
        Parameters:
        tx - x-translation to use
        ty - y-translation to use
        tz - z-translation to use
        Returns:
        affine matrix

      • interpolate

        public Quaternion interpolate(Quaternion other,
                              double t)
        Interpolates between this and another quaternion. Interpolation is usually used when animating rotating objects.
        Parameters:
        other - another quaternion
        t - value between 0.0 and 1.0
        Returns:
        interpolated quaternion

      • toEuler

        public Euler toEuler()
        Returns the euler representation of a normalized quaternion.
        Returns:
        Euler

      • toAxisAngle

        public AxisAngle toAxisAngle()
        Converts a normalized quaternion to axis/angle.
        Returns:
        axis/angle

      • toAxisAngle

        public static AxisAngle toAxisAngle(double w,
                                    double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double z)
        Converts normalized Quaternion to an axis/angle rotation.
        Parameters:
        w - W
        x - X
        y - Y
        z - Z
        Returns:
        rotation in axis angle representation

      • normalize

        public Quaternion normalize(double epsilon)
        Normalizes the quaternion
        Parameters:
        epsilon - if length squared less than this value, return a non-rotating quaternion
        Returns:
        normalized quaternion
